tika-abh03t0:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desento bhagavā yasmiṁ samaye desesi, taṁ samayaṁ dassetuṁ, vibhaṅgānantaraṁ
tika-abh03t0:5_1: desitassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṁ dassetuṁ vā “aṭṭhārasahī”tiādimāha. Tattha
tika-abh03t0:5_3: samudayappahānapariññāvasena khandhamārassa, maccumārassa ca bodhimūle eva bhañjitattā
tika-abh03t0:5_4: parūpanissayarahitaṁ niratisayaṁ taṁ bhañjanaṁ upādāya bhagavā eva “mārabhañjano”ti
tika-abh03t0:5_5: thomito. Tattha māre abhañjesi, mārabhañjanaṁ vā etassa, na pararājādibhañjananti
tika-abh03t0:6_0: Khandhādayo araṇantā dhammā sabhāvaṭṭhena dhātuyo, abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
tika-abh03t0:6_1: vāti katvā tesaṁ kathanato imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathāti adhivacanaṁ. Yadipi aññesu
tika-abh03t0:6_2: ca pakaraṇesu te sabhāvā kathitā, ettha pana tesaṁ sabbesaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīsu cuddasasu
tika-abh03t0:6_3: nayesu ekekasmiṁ kathitattā sātisayaṁ kathananti idameva evaṁnāmakaṁ. Ekadesakathanameva
tika-abh03t0:6_4: hi aññattha katanti. Khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā khandhādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgahādayo
tika-abh03t0:6_5: nayā vuttāti tattha mahāvisayānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vasena dhātūhi kathā dhātukathāti evaṁ
tika-abh03t0:6_6: assa nāmaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Dvidhā tidhā chadhā aṭṭhārasadhāti anekadhā dhātubhedaṁ
tika-abh03t0:6_7: pakāsesīti dhātubhedappakāsanoti. Tassatthanti tassā dhātukathāya atthaṁ. A-kāre
tika-abh03t0:6_8: ā-kārassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. “Yaṁ dhātukatha”nti vā ettha pakaraṇanti vacanaseso sattannaṁ
tika-abh03t0:6_9: pakaraṇānaṁ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattāti tena yojanaṁ katvā tassa pakaraṇassa atthaṁ
tika-abh03t0:6_10: tassatthanti a-kāralopo vā. Tanti taṁ dīpanaṁ suṇātha, taṁ vā atthaṁ taṁdīpanavacanasavanena
tika-abh03t0:6_11: upadhārethāti attho. Samāhitāti nānākiccehi avikkhittacittā, attano citte āhitāti vā attho.
tika-abh03t0:10_0: 1. Ko panetassa pakaraṇassa paricchedoti? Na so idha vattabbo, aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pakaraṇaparicchedo
tika-abh03t0:10_1: vutto evāti dassento āha “cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vutta”nti. Khandhādīnaṁ desanā
tika-abh03t0:10_2: nīyati pavattīyati etehi, khandhādayo eva vā nīyanti ñāyanti etehi pakārehīti nayā,
tika-abh03t0:10_3: nayānaṁ mātikā uddeso, nayā eva vā mātikāti nayamātikā. Etesaṁ padānaṁ mūlabhūtattāti
tika-abh03t0:12_1: ca yesu dvādasasu aṅgesu paccekaṁ paṭiccasamuppādasaddo vattati, tadatthāni dvādasa
tika-abh03t0:12_2: padāni dassitānīti tesaṁ tathādassitānaṁ sarūpeneva dassitānaṁ phassādīnañca padānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:12_3: vasena āha “pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā”ti. Tattha kammupapattikāmabhavādīnaṁ idha
tika-abh03t0:12_4: vibhattānaṁ bhāvanabhavanabhāvena bhave viya sokādīnaṁ jarāmaraṇassa viya aniṭṭhattā
tika-abh03t0:12_5: tannidānadukkhabhāvena ca jarāmaraṇe antogadhatāya paṭiccasamuppādassa dvādasapadatā
tika-abh03t0:12_6: daṭṭhabbā. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ bhinditvā avissajjitānampi satipaṭṭhānādīnaṁ bhinditvā
tika-abh03t0:12_7: gahaṇaṁ karonto tesaṁ bhinditvāpi vissajjitabbataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:13_0: Nayamātikādikā lakkhaṇamātikantā mātikā pakaraṇantarāsādhāraṇatāya dhātukathāya mātikā
tika-abh03t0:13_1: nāma, tassā abbhantare vutto vibhajitabbānaṁ uddeso abbhantaramātikā nāmāti imamatthaṁ
tika-abh03t0:13_2: pakāsento “ayañhī”tiādimāha. Tattha evaṁ avatvāti yathā “sabbāpi…pe… mātikā”ti ayaṁ
tika-abh03t0:13_3: dhātukathāmātikato bahiddhā vuttā, evaṁ avatvāti attho. Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti
tika-abh03t0:13_4: ca dhātukathāmātikāya abbhantareyevāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tadāveṇikamātikāabbhantare
tika-abh03t0:13_5: hi ṭhapitā tassāyeva abbhantare ṭhapitāti vuttā. Atha vā evaṁ avatvāti yathā “sabbāpi…pe…
tika-abh03t0:13_6: mātikā”ti etena vacanena dhātukathāto bahibhūtā kusalādiaraṇantā mātikā pakaraṇantaragatā
tika-abh03t0:13_7: vuttā, evaṁ avatvāti attho. Dhātukathāya abbhantareyevāti ca imassa pakaraṇassa abbhantare
tika-abh03t0:13_8: eva sarūpato dassetvā ṭhapitattāti attho. Sabbassa abhidhammassa mātikāya asaṅgahitattā
tika-abh03t0:15_1: uddeso nayamukhamātikā. Cuddasapi hi saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogānaṁ vomissakatāvasena
tika-abh03t0:15_2: pavattāti yehi te cattāropi honti, te dhammā cuddasannampi nayānaṁ mukhāni hontīti.
tika-abh03t0:15_3: Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadādīsu saccādīhipi yathāsambhavaṁ saṅgahāsaṅgaho yadipi
tika-abh03t0:15_4: vutto, so pana saṅgāhakabhūtehi tehi vutto, na saṅgahabhūtehi, sopi “cakkhāyatanena
tika-abh03t0:15_5: ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādinā pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhāre
tika-abh03t0:15_6: tatthāpi khandhādīheva saṅgahehi niyametvā vutto, tasmā “tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh03t0:15_7: vuttaṁ. Pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammuddhārepi pana pucchāvissajjanesu ca rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ
tika-abh03t0:15_8: araṇantānaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ sampayogavippayogā catūheva khandhehi hontīti “catūhi
tika-abh03t0:16_0: Nanu ca vippayogo rūpanibbānehipi hoti, kasmā “catūhi vippayogo”ti vuttanti? Rūpanibbānehi
tika-abh03t0:16_1: bhavantassapi catūheva bhāvato. Na hi rūpaṁ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṁ hoti,
tika-abh03t0:16_2: nibbānaṁ vā rūpena, catūheva pana khandhehi hotīti catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ rūpanibbānehi
tika-abh03t0:16_3: vippayogopi vippayujjamānehi catūhi khandhehi niyamito tehi vinā vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh03t0:16_4: So cāyaṁ vippayogo anārammaṇassa, anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehi missakassa ca na
tika-abh03t0:16_5: hoti, anārammaṇassa pana missakassa ca sārammaṇena, sārammaṇassa sārammaṇena anārammaṇena
tika-abh03t0:18_0: 4. Saṅgahoyeva saṅgahanayo. Sabhāgo. Visabhāgoti etassa “tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh03t0:18_1: etena, “catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogo”ti etenapi visuṁ yojanā kātabbā. Tena
tika-abh03t0:18_2: saṅgaho asaṅgaho ca sabhāgo visabhāgo ca bhāvo, tathā sampayogo vippayogo cāti ayamattho
tika-abh03t0:18_3: viññāyati. Yassa vā saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca, so dhammo sabhāgo visabhāgo ca, tathā
tika-abh03t0:18_4: yassa sampayogo vippayogo ca, sopi sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti. Tattha yena rūpakkhandho…pe…
tika-abh03t0:18_5: manoviññāṇadhātūti dhammā gaṇanaṁ gacchanti, so ruppanādiko samānabhāvo saṅgahe sabhāgatā,
tika-abh03t0:20_0: 5.Evaṁ dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattāti “sabbāpi…pe… mātikā”ti etena ṭhapanākārena
tika-abh03t0:20_1: bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattāti attho. Etena vā ṭhapanākārena kusalādīnaṁ araṇantānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:20_2: idha aṭṭhapetvā dhātukathāya mātikato bahi pakaraṇantaramātikāya imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-abh03t0:21_0: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saṅgaho ekavidhova, so kasmā “catubbidho”ti vuttoti? Saṅgahoti
tika-abh03t0:21_1: atthaṁ avatvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā. Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīsu saddesu
tika-abh03t0:21_2: saṅgahasaddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhetthattho. Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso
tika-abh03t0:21_3: sāmaññena gahetabbataṁ patto “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”tiādīsu “saṅgaho”ti vuttoti na koci
tika-abh03t0:21_4: doso. Niddhārite hi visese tassa ekavidhatā siyā, na tato pubbeti. Jātisaddassa sāpekkhasaddattā
tika-abh03t0:21_5: “jātiyā saṅgaho”ti vutte “attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa avuttattāti
tika-abh03t0:21_6: jātisaṅgahoti rūpakaṇḍe vutto sajātisaṅgaho vutto hoti.
tika-abh03t0:22_0: Ettha nayamātikāya “saṅgaho asaṅgaho, sampayogo vippayogo”ti ime dve pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaṁ
tika-abh03t0:22_1: aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayauddesā, avasesā niddhāretvā.
tika-abh03t0:22_2: “Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti hi “saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ asaṅgahita”nti vattabbe ekassa
tika-abh03t0:22_3: asaṅgahitasaddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena saṅgahitavisesavisiṭṭho yo asaṅgahito dhammaviseso,
tika-abh03t0:22_5: ca visesane karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Esa nayo tatiyādīsu dasamāvasānesu nayuddesesu
tika-abh03t0:22_6: chaṭṭhavajjesu. Tesupi hi vuttanayena dvīhi dvīhi padehi pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ
tika-abh03t0:22_7: katvā tattha tattha antimapadasadisena tatiyapadena pucchanavissajjananayā uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:22_8: Tattha catutthapañcamesu kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso, sattamādīsu ca catūsu sahayoge
tika-abh03t0:22_9: daṭṭhabbo, na dutiyatatiyesu viya samānādhikaraṇe visesane. Tattha hi sabhāvantarena
tika-abh03t0:22_10: sabhāvantarassa visesanaṁ kataṁ, etesu dhammantarena dhammantarassāti. Ekādasamādīsu
tika-abh03t0:22_11: pana catūsu ādipadeneva dhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ katvā itarehi pucchanavissajjananayā
tika-abh03t0:22_12: uddiṭṭhā. Visesane eva cettha karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Pucchāvissajjanānañhi nissayabhūtā
tika-abh03t0:22_13: dhammā saṅgahitatādivisesena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttavippayuttādibhāvaṁ attano visesentīti.
tika-abh03t0:23_0: Vikappatoti vividhakappanato, vibhāgatoti attho. Sanniṭṭhānavasenāti adhimokkhasampayogavasena.
tika-abh03t0:23_1: Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā,
tika-abh03t0:23_2: tesaṁ sādhāraṇavasenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Adhimokkho hi sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh03t0:23_3: vuttānaṁ cittuppādānaṁ sādhāraṇavasena vutto, itare sabbesanti. Tattha sādhāraṇā
tika-abh03t0:23_4: pasaṭā pākaṭā cāti ādito pariggahetabbā, tasmā tesaṁ saṅgahādipariggahatthaṁ uddeso
tika-abh03t0:23_5: kato, asādhāraṇāpi pana pariggahetabbāvāti tesu mahāvisayena aññesampi saṅgahādipariggahaṁ
tika-abh03t0:23_6: dassetuṁ adhimokkho uddiṭṭho. “Sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā”ti ca dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāyaṁ
tika-abh03t0:23_7: paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca vacanaṁ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh03t0:23_8: ye vuttā, tesaṁ sabbesaṁ sādhāraṇatoti pana atthe sati sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu vattabbesu
tika-abh03t0:23_9: yo asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayo adhimokkho, tassa vasena vuttasabbacittuppādasādhāraṇato
tika-abh03t0:23_10: phassādayo sabbasādhāraṇāti adhimokkho ca asādhāraṇesu mahāvisayoti katvā vutto aññassa
tika-abh03t0:24_0: Jīvitindriyaṁ panettha rūpamissakattā na vuttanti veditabbaṁ, cittekaggatā pana asamādhisabhāvā
tika-abh03t0:24_1: sāmaññasaddeneva sāmaññavisesasaddehi ca samādhisabhāvā visesasaddavacanīyaṁ aññaṁ
tika-abh03t0:24_3: tasseva dhammassa bhedadīpakehi vattabbā, na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vuttalakkhaṇaviparītehi
tika-abh03t0:24_4: sāmaññavisesasaddeheva, tasmā “cittekaggatā”ti ayaṁ sāmaññasaddo samādhisabhāve visesasaddanirapekkho
tika-abh03t0:24_5: pavattamāno sayameva visesasaddamāpajjitvā asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya, itaro ca
tika-abh03t0:24_6: samādhisabhāvamevāti dvidhā bhinnā cittekaggatā asādhāraṇā ceva appavisayā cāti idha
tika-abh03t0:24_7: uddesaṁ na arahati. Abhinnāpi vā phassādīnaṁ viya pākaṭattābhāvato aññadhammanissayena
tika-abh03t0:24_8: vattabbato ca sā jīvitañca na arahatīti na uddiṭṭhāti.
tika-abh03t0:29_0: 6. Khandhāyatanadhātuyomahantare abhiññeyyadhammabhāvena vuttā, tesaṁ pana sabhāvato
tika-abh03t0:29_2: indriyādīni ca vuttānīti saccādiviseso viya saṅgahāsaṅgahaviseso ca abhiññeyyanissito
tika-abh03t0:29_3: vuccamāno suviññeyyo hotīti “tīhi saṅgaho. Tīhi asaṅgaho”ti nayamukhamātikā ṭhapitāti
tika-abh03t0:29_4: veditabbā. Evañca katvā “catūhī”ti vuttā sampayogavippayogā ca abhiññeyyanissayena
tika-abh03t0:29_5: khandhādīheva pucchitvā vissajjitāti. Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenāti ye dhammā “rūpakkhandho”ti
tika-abh03t0:29_6: vuccanti, tesaṁ pañcasu khandhesu rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hotīti rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena,
tika-abh03t0:29_7: rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā gaṇanena saṅgahaṁ gaṇanaṁ dasseti. Tenāha “yañhi
tika-abh03t0:29_8: kiñcī”tiādi. Rūpakkhandhoti hi saṅgahitabbadhammo dassito. Yena saṅgahena saṅgayhati,
tika-abh03t0:29_9: tassa saṅgahassa dassanaṁ “ekena khandhenā”ti vacanaṁ. Pañcasu khandhagaṇanesu ekena
tika-abh03t0:29_10: khandhagaṇanena gaṇitoti ayañhettha attho. Yasmā ca khandhādivacanehi saṅgaho vuccati,
tika-abh03t0:30_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddeseti idaṁ “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti etasseva nayassa ekadesanayabhāvena
tika-abh03t0:30_1: vuttaṁ, na nayantaratāyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā
tika-abh03t0:30_2: dassitāti etena vedanākkhandhamūlakā purimena yojiyamāne viseso natthīti pacchimeheva
tika-abh03t0:30_3: yojetvā tayo dukā dve tikā eko catukko, saññākkhandhamūlakā dve dukā eko tiko, saṅkhārakkhandhamūlako
tika-abh03t0:30_4: eko dukoti ete labbhantīti dasseti. Tesaṁ pana bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantaraṁ
tika-abh03t0:30_5: pucchāvissajjanaṁ kātabbaṁ saṁkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, vuttanayena vā sakkā ñātunti
tika-abh03t0:32_0: 40.Yasmāca dukatikesūti yadipi ekakepi sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ, ekake pana sadisavissajjanānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:32_1: cakkhundriyasotindriyasukhindriyādīnaṁ dukādīsu asadisavissajjanaṁ diṭṭhaṁ. Na hettha
tika-abh03t0:32_3: idha pana dukkhasamudayadukkhamaggadukānaṁ aññamaññaṁ tikena ca sadisaṁ vissajjananti
tika-abh03t0:32_4: dukatikesveva sadisavissajjanataṁ samudayānantaraṁ maggasaccassa vacane kāraṇaṁ vadati.
tika-abh03t0:34_0: 61. “Pucchaṁ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhena, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhenā”ti
tika-abh03t0:34_1: likhitabbepi pamādavasena “avijjā ekena khandhenā”ti idaṁ na likhitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:34_2: Sarūpekasesaṁ vā katvā avijjāvacanena avijjāvissajjanaṁ dassitanti. Sabbampi vipākaviññāṇanti
tika-abh03t0:34_3: ettha vipākaggahaṇena visesanaṁ na kātabbaṁ. Kusalādīnampi hi viññāṇānaṁ dhātukathāyaṁ
tika-abh03t0:34_5: “vipākā dhammā”ti imassa vissajjanāsadisena tesaṁ vissajjanena dassitā, idha ca nāmarūpassa
tika-abh03t0:35_1: vinibbhujjitvā anupalabbhamānāni paramatthānaṁ sabhāvamattabhūtāni, tāni rūpassa
tika-abh03t0:35_6: tāni cakkhāyatanādīhi ekantaparamatthakiccehi agayhamānāni nissattaṭṭhena dhammāyatanadhammadhātudhammehi
tika-abh03t0:35_7: sabhāgāni, tena tehi khandhādīhi saṅgayhantīti “jāti dvīhi khandhehī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh03t0:38_0: 171. Saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese yaṁ taṁ uddese asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbaṁ
tika-abh03t0:38_1: vissajjitabbañca saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhaṁ asaṅgahitaṁ dhammajātaṁ niddhāritaṁ, tadeva
tika-abh03t0:38_2: tāva dassento “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh03t0:38_3: asaṅgahitā”ti āha. Sabbattha khandhādisaṅgahasāmaññānaṁ niccaṁ visesāpekkhattā bhedanissitattā
tika-abh03t0:38_4: ca pucchāvissajjanānaṁ savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā suddhā. Tattha saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitavacanamattena
tika-abh03t0:38_5: dhammavisesassa niddhāritattā tīsu saṅgahesu ekena dvīhi vā ye saṅgahitā hutvā aññehi
tika-abh03t0:38_6: asaṅgahitā, teyeva dhammā “khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh03t0:38_7: ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṁ, tesaṁ pana evaṁvidhānaṁ asambhavā nayamātikāya ca abbhantarabāhiramātikāpekkhattā
tika-abh03t0:38_8: uddesepi yaṁ yaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu saṅgāhakaṁ, taṁ taṁ apekkhitvā saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh03t0:38_9: niddhāritanti viññāyatīti tena tena saṅgāhakena yathāniddhāritaṁ dhammaṁ niyametvā
tika-abh03t0:38_11: natthi, tasmiṁ paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena, itaresu
tika-abh03t0:38_12: ca yaṁ yaṁ pucchitabbavissajjitabbaṁ niddhāritaṁ, tassa tassa niyāmakabhāvena rūpakkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t0:39_1: “khandhasaṅgahena āyatanasaṅgahena dhātusaṅgahenā”ti karaṇatthe. Ettha ca yena yena
tika-abh03t0:39_2: saṅgāhakena khandhādisaṅgahesu tena tena saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṁ aññaṁ atthi, taṁ
tika-abh03t0:39_3: tadeva saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakabhāvena uddhaṭaṁ. Rūpakkhandhena pana khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbo
tika-abh03t0:39_4: añño dhammo natthi, tathā vedanākkhandhādīhi, na ca so eva tassa saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh03t0:39_5: vā hoti. Yañca “rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena saṅgahito”ti vuttaṁ, tañca na tasseva
tika-abh03t0:39_6: tena saṅgahitataṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, rūpakkhandhabhāvena pana rūpakkhandhavacanena
tika-abh03t0:40_0: Yadi ca so eva tena saṅgayheyya, saṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadaniddese – “vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:40_1: ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh03t0:40_2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā”tiādi vattabbaṁ
tika-abh03t0:40_3: siyā, na ca vuttaṁ, tasmā yathā cittaṁ cittena sampayuttaṁ vippayuttañca na hoti,
tika-abh03t0:40_4: evaṁ rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hoti, tathā vedanākkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t0:40_5: vedanākkhandhādīhi. Na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cāti. Teneva na ekadesā
tika-abh03t0:40_6: viya samudāyassa, samudāyo ekadesānaṁ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca. Yathā rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t0:40_7: cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ vedanākkhandhādīnaṁ, saraṇā dhammā catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:40_8: Samudāyantogadhānañhi ekadesānaṁ na vibhāgo atthi, yena te samudāyassa samudāyo ca
tika-abh03t0:40_9: tesaṁ sabhāgo visabhāgo ca siyāti, tathā na samudāyo ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānaṁ saṅgāhako
tika-abh03t0:40_10: asaṅgāhako ca. Yathā dhammāyatanaṁ sukhumarūpasabhāgassa vedanādivisabhāgassa ca
tika-abh03t0:40_13: Na hi ekadesasabhāgaṁ samudāyasabhāgaṁ, nāpi ekadesavisabhāgaṁ samudāyavisabhāganti,
tika-abh03t0:40_14: tasmā satipi attato attani antogadhato attekadesasabhāgato ca aññassa asaṅgāhakatte
tika-abh03t0:40_15: saṅgāhakattameva etesaṁ natthi, yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakā siyunti saṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh03t0:41_0: Yaṁ pana “dhammāyatanaṁ asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti,
tika-abh03t0:41_1: “cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena saṅgahita”nti ca vuttaṁ, na tena ekadesānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:41_2: samudāyasaṅgāhakattaṁ, samudāyassa ca ekadesasaṅgāhakattaṁ dasseti, catukkhandhagaṇanabhedehi
tika-abh03t0:41_3: pana dhammāyatanassa gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvena pañcadhā bhinnataṁ, cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ
tika-abh03t0:41_5: gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbānaṁ taṁtaṁgaṇanehi gaṇanadassanamattameva hi paṭhamanayo kammakaraṇamattasabbhāvā,
tika-abh03t0:41_6: dutiyādayo pana saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakehi saṅgahitāsaṅgahitānaṁ agaṇanādidassanāni kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā.
tika-abh03t0:41_7: Tathā paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbabhāvasaṅkhāto taṁtaṁkhandhādibhāvābhāvo
tika-abh03t0:41_9: samānakkhandhādibhāvo sabhāgatā, tadabhāvo ca visabhāgatā. Pucchāvissajjanesu taṁtaṁkhandhādibhāvābhāvo
tika-abh03t0:42_0: Samudayasaccasukhindriyasadisāni pana tehi saṅgahetabbameva atthi, na saṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh03t0:42_1: asaṅgahetabbanti asaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭāni. Dukkhasaccasadisāni tehi visabhāgasamudāyabhūtehi
tika-abh03t0:42_2: anekakkhandhehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahetabbaṁ, itarehi asaṅgahetabbañca natthīti
tika-abh03t0:42_5: uddhaṭānīti veditabbāni. Tattha “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh03t0:42_6: cakkhāyatanavajjā rūpadhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti veditabbā, na rūpakkhandhoti.
tika-abh03t0:43_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana khandhapadenāti khandhapadasaṅgahenāti attho, na saṅgāhakenāti.
tika-abh03t0:43_1: “Kenaci saṅgāhakenā”ti idaṁ pana ānetvā vattabbaṁ. Taṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjatīti
tika-abh03t0:43_2: taṁ vissajjanaṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu saṅgāhakesu na yujjatīti attho. Rūpakkhandhena hi…pe…
tika-abh03t0:43_3: saṅgahitoti etena nayena cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito, so ca aḍḍhekādasahi
tika-abh03t0:43_4: āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthīti evaṁ cakkhāyatanādīnipi na gahetabbānīti
tika-abh03t0:43_5: āpajjatīti ce? Nāpajjati. Na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṁ evasaddassa attho, atha kho saṅgāhakato
tika-abh03t0:43_6: aññanivāraṇaṁ. So cātiādi ca na nirapekkhavacanaṁ, atha kho saṅgāhakāpekkhanti. Kathaṁ?
tika-abh03t0:43_7: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahitoti yathā cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanato
tika-abh03t0:43_8: aññampi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi, yaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh03t0:43_9: hoti, na evaṁ rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhato aññaṁ khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitaṁ atthi,
tika-abh03t0:43_10: yaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ siyā, rūpakkhandhena pana rūpakkhandhova khandhasaṅgahena
tika-abh03t0:43_11: saṅgahitoti ayañhettha adhippāyo yutto. Siyā panetaṁ “so eva rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:43_12: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahito hotū”ti, taṁ nivārento āha “so ca aḍḍhekādasahi
tika-abh03t0:43_13: āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthī”ti. Ettha ca “rūpakkhandhenā”ti ānetvā vattabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:43_14: Tattha rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhassa vā tadekadesānaṁ vā cakkhādīnaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi
tika-abh03t0:43_15: saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hotīti iminā pariyāyena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti
tika-abh03t0:43_16: yujjati, na rūpakkhandhena rūpakkhandhassa tadekadesānaṁ vā aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi
tika-abh03t0:43_17: saṅgahitatāya. Na hi sā saṅgahitatā atthi. Yadi siyā, saṅgahitenasampayuttavippayuttapadaniddese
tika-abh03t0:43_18: rūpakkhandhopi uddharitabbo siyā. Tena hi tīhipi saṅgahehi rūpakkhandho tadekadeso
tika-abh03t0:43_19: vā saṅgahitā siyuṁ, atthi ca tesaṁ vippayuttatāti.
tika-abh03t0:44_0: Evaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni, aññāni cāti etthāpi cakkhāyatanādīhi viya etehi
tika-abh03t0:44_1: aññehi ca saṅgahitānaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca yathā vā tathā vā
tika-abh03t0:44_2: etāni viya ayujjamānavissajjanattā evarūpāni padāni saṅgāhakabhāvena na gahitānīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh03t0:45_0: Tattha yaṁ vuttaṁ “rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito”ti, taṁ teneva tassa
tika-abh03t0:45_1: saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattābhāvadassanena nivāritaṁ. Yañhettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ vuttaṁ,
tika-abh03t0:45_2: tañca satipi saṅgahitatte asaṅgahitatāya abhāvatoti viññāyamānaṁ samudayasaccādīsu
tika-abh03t0:45_3: yujjeyya sati tehi saṅgahite tadasaṅgahitattābhāvato. Rūpakkhandhādīhi pana saṅgahitameva
tika-abh03t0:45_4: natthi, kuto tassa asaṅgahitatā bhavissati, tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvo evettha aggahaṇe
tika-abh03t0:45_5: kāraṇanti yuttaṁ. Saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṁ yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā attano
tika-abh03t0:45_6: attani antogadhassa attekadesasabhāgassa ca natthi, aññassa pana atthīti na dukkhasaccādīsu
tika-abh03t0:45_7: viya ubhayābhāvo cettha aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ bhavituṁ yuttoti. Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnañca
tika-abh03t0:45_8: khandhacatukkadukādisaṅgāhakatte sati na tesaṁ saṅgahitānaṁ tehi dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīhi
tika-abh03t0:45_9: āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgahitatā natthīti asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo anekantiko, tasmā
tika-abh03t0:45_10: pubbe vuttanayeneva aggahitānaṁ aggahaṇe, gahitānañca gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ veditabbanti.
tika-abh03t0:46_0: Anidassanaṁ punadeva sappaṭighanti ettha anidassananti etena “sanidassanasappaṭigha”nti
tika-abh03t0:46_1: ettha vuttena sappaṭighasaddena saddhiṁ yojetvā anidassanasappaṭighā dassitā. Punadevāti
tika-abh03t0:46_2: etena tattheva avisiṭṭhaṁ sanidassanapadaṁ nivattetvā gaṇhanto sanidassanadukapadaṁ
tika-abh03t0:46_3: dasseti. “Cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahita”nti idaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:46_4: Na hi “cakkhāyatanena cakkhāyatanaṁ āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahita”nti ca “asaṅgahita”nti
tika-abh03t0:46_5: ca vattabbanti dassitoyaṁ nayoti. Evaṁ sabbattha tasseva samudāyekadesānañca saṅgāhakasaṅgahitanti
tika-abh03t0:46_6: vacanesu asaṅgāhakaasaṅgahitanti vacanesu ca tadavattabbatā yojetabbā. Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh03t0:46_7: eva hi cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhāyatanādīhi asaṅgahitānīti na vuccanti, na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti.
tika-abh03t0:49_1: vedanādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ khandhānaṁ nibbānassa ca sukhumarūpena saha āyatanadhātusabhāgatte
tika-abh03t0:49_2: satipi na sukhumarūpameva rūpakkhandhoti rūpakkhandhena āyatanadhātusabhāgattaṁ natthi,
tika-abh03t0:49_3: tasmā na tena tāni āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitāni. Na kevalaṁ saṅgahitāneva, asaṅgahitānipi
tika-abh03t0:49_4: tena tāni tehi saṅgahehi na honteva tadekadesena sukhumarūpena āyatanadhātusabhāgattā,
tika-abh03t0:49_5: saṅgahitābhāvo eva pana idhādhippeto, viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi pana asaṅgahitā
tika-abh03t0:49_6: na te tehi kathañci sammissāti sabbathā te tehi na saṅgahitā. Dukkhasaccādīhi ca
tika-abh03t0:49_8: viya āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ tehi na hoti, tasmā saṅgāhakattābhāvato eva
tika-abh03t0:49_10: pana abyākatadhammādīnaṁ asaṅgāhakattābhāvatova. Na hi taṁ kañci atthi, yassa te
tika-abh03t0:49_11: khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgāhakā siyuṁ, na ca attano ekadeso attekadesasabhāgo ca attanā
tika-abh03t0:49_12: asaṅgahito hotīti attanā asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattā pana vedanākkhandhādīnaṁ gahaṇaṁ katanti.
tika-abh03t0:50_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ “ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti, taṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh03t0:50_1: Dhammāyatanena hi na koci dhammo kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahito atthi visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā,
tika-abh03t0:50_2: khandhasaṅgahena sayameva attano saṅgāhakaṁ na hotīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi ca saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti
tika-abh03t0:50_3: dassitoyaṁ nayoti etassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena gaṇitāti attho. Yāni…pe… gahitānīti
tika-abh03t0:50_4: etena viññāṇasammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpentāni iddhipādādipadāni, oḷārikarūpasammissaṁ
tika-abh03t0:50_5: dīpentāni rūpakkhandhādipadāni, sabbena sabbaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ adīpentāni viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādipadāni,
tika-abh03t0:50_6: sakaladhammāyatanadīpakāni dhammāyatanādipadāni ca vajjetvā dhammāyatanekadesaṁ aññāyatanena
tika-abh03t0:53_0: 191. Saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese yasmā yathā dutiyatatiyanayā tiṇṇaṁ saṅgahānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:53_2: ca uddiṭṭhā, nevaṁ catutthapañcamā. Saṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh03t0:53_3: uddiṭṭhaṁ, asaṅgahaṇappavattiyā eva ca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitanti, tasmā saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe
tika-abh03t0:53_4: saṅgahitadhammāsaṅgahitadhammavisese nissitā ete dve nayāti ettha kenaci saṅgahitena
tika-abh03t0:53_5: dhammavisesena puna saṅgahito dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito saṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo
tika-abh03t0:53_6: vissajjitabbo ca, tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṁ dassento “samudayasaccena ye dhammā
tika-abh03t0:53_7: khandha…pe… saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… saṅgahitā”ti āha. Ettha
tika-abh03t0:53_8: ca ye tīhipi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhadhammāyatanadukkhasaccādīni
tika-abh03t0:53_9: viya, ye ca dvīhāyatanadhātusaṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā cakkhāyatanādīni viya, ye ca ekena
tika-abh03t0:53_11: viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viya ca, te dhammā saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā saṅgāhakabhāvena
tika-abh03t0:53_12: na uddhaṭā, tīhipi pana saṅgahehi ye saṅgāhakā, te saṅgāhakattābhāvābhāvato idha
tika-abh03t0:53_13: uddhaṭā. Tehi saṅgahitāpi hi ekantena attano saṅgāhakassa saṅgāhakā honti, yassa
tika-abh03t0:54_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana sakalena hi khandhādipadenāti sakalavācakena rūpakkhandhādipadenāti
tika-abh03t0:54_1: attho. Yaṁ panetaṁ vuttaṁ “yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ
tika-abh03t0:54_2: gaccheyyā”ti, taṁ tena khandhādipadenāti evaṁ ayojetvā taṁ aññaṁ saṅgahitaṁ nāma
tika-abh03t0:54_3: natthīti evaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ. Na hi yena yaṁ saṅgahitaṁ, teneva tassa saṅgaho pucchito
tika-abh03t0:54_4: vissajjito, na ca tasseva, atha kho tena saṅgahitassāti. Yathā vedanā saddo ca khandho
tika-abh03t0:54_5: āyatanañca, na evaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ, taṁ pana khandhāyatanānaṁ ekadesova, tasmā “sukhumarūpekadesaṁ
tika-abh03t0:54_6: vā”ti avatvā “sukhumarūpaṁ vā”ti vuttaṁ. Sabbattha ca aññena asammissanti yojetabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:54_7: Yampi cetaṁ vuttaṁ “tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, te dhamme sandhāyā”ti,
tika-abh03t0:54_8: tampi tathā na sakkā vattuṁ. Na hi saṅgahitena saṅgahitassa saṅgahitena saṅgaho ettha
tika-abh03t0:54_9: pucchito vissajjito ca, atha kho saṅgahova, tasmā ekena khandhenāti ekena khandhagaṇanenāti
tika-abh03t0:54_10: ayamevettha attho, na saṅgāhakenāti. Na hi eko khandho attano ekadesassa saṅgāhakoti.
tika-abh03t0:57_1: veditabbaṁ. Ettha ca sasukhumarūpaviññāṇasahitadhammasamudāyā ye te dukkhasaccaanidassanaappaṭighaacetasikānupādāsadisā
tika-abh03t0:57_2: satipi ekena dvīhi vā saṅgahehi kesañci asaṅgāhakatte tīhipi asaṅgahetabbassa abhāvato
tika-abh03t0:57_3: paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā na honti, abyākatadhammasadisā kenaci saṅgahena asaṅgahetabbabhāvato
tika-abh03t0:57_4: asaṅgāhakā eva na honti, tena te asaṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā, itare pana tabbipariyāyena uddhaṭāti.
tika-abh03t0:58_0: Yaṁ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyyā”ti
tika-abh03t0:58_1: vuttaṁ, taṁ dukkhasaccaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Anidassanaappaṭighesu pana asaṅgāhakesu
tika-abh03t0:58_2: nibbānaṁ antogadhaṁ, na ca tadeva tassa asaṅgāhakanti. Sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena
tika-abh03t0:58_3: samodhānetvā katehi saddhinti evaṁ katehi dutiyapañhādīhi saddhiṁ paṭhamapañhanāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh03t0:58_4: sabbepi catuttiṁsa hontīti attho. Yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadevāti rūpakkhandhādivisesakapadaṁ
tika-abh03t0:58_5: vadati, na niddhārite pucchitabbadhamme. Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitā, na padena sarūpatoti.
tika-abh03t0:58_6: Tattha tadevāti eva-saddena na taṁ kadāci saṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ na hotīti uddhaṭasseva
tika-abh03t0:58_7: asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāve niyatataṁ aññassa ca aniyatataṁ dassetīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:58_8: “Tadeva yehi asaṅgahita”nti ettha hi “niyamato”ti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti. Atha
tika-abh03t0:58_9: vā tadevāti pucchāya uddhaṭameva evaṁpakārameva hutvā yehi asaṅgahitanti tassa pucchāya
tika-abh03t0:58_10: uddhaṭabhāvena evaṁ asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvaniyamanattho eva-saddo, na aññassa
tika-abh03t0:58_12: asahitañca asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ hoti. Rūpakkhandhādīni hi aññasahitāni viññāṇakkhandhādīni asahitānīti.
tika-abh03t0:59_0: Avasesā saṅgahitāti idaṁ avasesā asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tehipi viññāṇadhammehi
tika-abh03t0:59_1: te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti pucchāya uddhaṭā tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā
tika-abh03t0:59_2: hutvā asaṅgahitāti adhippāyo. Anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā evāti. Ettha ca
tika-abh03t0:59_3: paṭhame naye vedanādayopi viññāṇena asaṅgahitāti vuttā, dutiye rūpadhammāvāti ayaṁ
tika-abh03t0:59_4: viseso. Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti oḷārikarūpehi
tika-abh03t0:59_5: viññāṇena ca tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāti attho. Rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahitoti.
tika-abh03t0:60_0: 196. Catutthapañhe cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti ettha cakkhāyatananti etena
tika-abh03t0:60_1: pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ asaṅgāhakaṁ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Cakkhāyatanena pana asaṅgahitena
tika-abh03t0:60_2: asaṅgahitāni dasa oḷārikāyatanāni na cakkhāyatanamevāti. “Rūpañca dhammāyatana”ntiādinā
tika-abh03t0:60_3: yehi dhammehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ taṁ viññāṇameva hoti, asaṅgahitena tena
tika-abh03t0:60_4: asaṅgahitañca viññāṇavajjaṁ sabbaṁ teva dhamme udāneti. Sadisavissajjanā hi ekato
tika-abh03t0:60_5: udānetvā dassetabbā. Tattha paṭhamena rūpakkhandhena sadisavissajjanesu ekato udānetvā
tika-abh03t0:60_6: dassitesu aññe visadisavissajjanā nayadānena dassitā honti. Tenāha “rūpañca dhammāyatananti…pe…
tika-abh03t0:60_7: aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitā”ti. Tattha dve bhavāti asaññekavokārabhavā. Dveti
tika-abh03t0:60_8: bāhirupādādhamme eva sandhāya vuttaṁ. Yena asaṅgāhakena asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh03t0:60_9: pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca paricchijjati, so rūpakkhandhādiko tassa pucchāvissajjanānañca
tika-abh03t0:60_10: nissayabhāvato “visayo”ti vutto, yathādassitassa pana uddānassa nayadānamattattā
tika-abh03t0:60_11: “nayo”ti vuttaṁ. “Dvevīsanayo cā”tipi pāṭho, dvevīsapadiko esa nayo cāti attho.
tika-abh03t0:63_0: 228. Sampayogavippayogapade yaṁ labbhati, yañca na labbhati, taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya
tika-abh03t0:63_1: gahitanti idaṁ na rūpakkhandhādīni padāni sandhāya vuttaṁ, atha kho sampayogapadaṁ
tika-abh03t0:63_2: vippayogapadañcāti veditabbaṁ. Rūpakkhandhādīsu hi yaṁ dhammāyatanādipadaṁ na labbhati,
tika-abh03t0:63_3: taṁ pucchāyapi na gahitaṁ. Sampayogapadaṁ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu alabbhamānampi “rūpakkhandho
tika-abh03t0:63_4: katihi…pe… sampayutto”ti evaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ, vedanākkhandhādīsu labbhamānaṁ, vippayogapadaṁ
tika-abh03t0:63_5: pana sabbattha labbhamānamevāti. Rūpadhammānaṁ pana rūpena nibbānena vā, nibbānassa
tika-abh03t0:63_6: ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthīti ekuppādādisabhāgatāya abhāvato sampayogaṁ
tika-abh03t0:63_7: nivārentena sā eva ekuppādāditā etesaṁ visabhāgatāti tadabhāvato vippayogopi nivārito
tika-abh03t0:63_8: eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Catūsu hi khandhesu vijjamānā ekuppādāditā tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ
tika-abh03t0:63_9: sabhāgatā hoti rūpanibbānehi tesaṁ tehi ca rūpanibbānānaṁ visabhāgatā ca, na ca rūpekadesassa
tika-abh03t0:63_10: nibbānassa vā sā ekuppādāditā atthi, yā rūpekadesena rūpekadesanibbānānaṁ nibbānena
tika-abh03t0:63_11: ca rūpassa visabhāgatā siyā. Teneva “catūhi vippayogo”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh03t0:64_0: Sattasuviññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutteti yathā rūpabhavo tīhi viññāṇadhātūhi,
tika-abh03t0:64_1: nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā pañcahi, avitakkaavicārā ekāya vippayutte anārammaṇamissake
tika-abh03t0:64_2: dhamme dīpenti, evaṁ adīpetvā ekāyapi vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi
tika-abh03t0:64_3: vā tā dīpentīti adhippāyo. Avippayutteti hi ye vippayuttā na honti, te dhammeti vuttaṁ
tika-abh03t0:64_4: hoti, na sampayutteti. Tena yāni tāhi sampayutte dīpenti dhammāyatanādipadāni, yāni
tika-abh03t0:64_5: ca sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi navattabbaṁ dīpenti acetasikādipadāni, yāni ca sampayuttanavattabbāni
tika-abh03t0:64_6: dīpenti dukkhasaccādipadāni, tesaṁ sabbesaṁ anārammaṇamissakadhammadīpakānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ
tika-abh03t0:64_8: khandhāyatanadhātūsu kenaci sampayogo vippayogo vā atthīti.
tika-abh03t0:65_0: Yadi evaṁ vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddese “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
tika-abh03t0:65_1: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”ti na vattabbaṁ. Akusalābyākatā hi anārammaṇamissobhayadhammāti?
tika-abh03t0:65_3: hi tadekadesā tadekadesaññasamudāyā ca, samudāyekadesānañca vibhāgābhāvato na sabhāgavisabhāgatā
tika-abh03t0:65_4: atthi, tena tesaṁ khandhādīhi sampayogavippayogābhāvo hoti. Kusalā pana dhammā akusalābyākatehi
tika-abh03t0:65_5: vibhattā, te ca kusalehi, na tesaṁ samudāyekadesabhāvo tadekadesaññasamudāyabhāvo
tika-abh03t0:65_6: vā, tasmā khandhādīni anāmasitvā vippayuttatāmattena yathāniddhāritadhammadassane
tika-abh03t0:65_7: kusalehi itaresaṁ, itarehi ca kusalānaṁ vippayogo na na hoti visabhāgatāsabbhāvatoti
tika-abh03t0:65_8: tesaṁ aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā. Esa nayo sabbesu evarūpesu.
tika-abh03t0:66_0: Uddāne pana aṭṭhārasa tato pareti idaṁ “soḷasā”ti vattabbaṁ, tevīsanti idañca “ekavīsa”nti.
tika-abh03t0:66_2: ekadesā samudayasaccavedanākkhandhādayo ekadesasammissā ca iddhipādādayo anārammaṇehi
tika-abh03t0:66_3: asammissā rūpakkhandhādayo ca sārammaṇehi asammissā sampayogīvippayogībhāvena samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh03t0:66_4: ca ekadesantarehi vibhattā eva gahitāti tehi te kehici ekadesantarehi vibhattehi
tika-abh03t0:66_5: yathāyogaṁ sampayogaṁ vippayogañca labhanti. Atthi hi tesaṁ ekuppādāditā sabhāgatā
tika-abh03t0:66_6: visabhāgatā cāti. Tena tattha tattha “ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā
tika-abh03t0:66_7: kehici sampayutta”nti ca, “ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ca vuttaṁ.
tika-abh03t0:66_8: Bhinnakālasamudāyā eva pana vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā vattamānā ca ekekadhammā eva,
tika-abh03t0:66_9: tasmā tesaṁ samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato na sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhassa
tika-abh03t0:66_10: vibhāgaṁ karonti, cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo ca viññāṇakkhandhassa manāyatanassa ca.
tika-abh03t0:66_11: Tena “sukhindriyaṁ ekena khandhena kehici vippayutta”nti, “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ekena
tika-abh03t0:66_12: khandhena ekenāyatanena kehici vippayuttā”ti ca evamādi na vuttaṁ, khandhāyatanavibhāgavirahitampi
tika-abh03t0:66_13: pana viññāṇaṁ dhātuvibhāgena vibhattameva vuttanti “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh03t0:66_14: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā”ti vuttaṁ, evamevaṁ indriyavibhāgena vibhattānaṁ sukhindriyādīnaṁ
tika-abh03t0:66_15: “sukhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādīsu yathāyogaṁ vippayogo daṭṭhabbo, nāvibhattassa
tika-abh03t0:67_0: 235. Yathā taṁsampayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya “samudayasaccaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayutta”nti
tika-abh03t0:67_1: vuttaṁ, evaṁ taṁvippayogībhāvaṁ sandhāya “tīhi khandhehi vippayutta”nti kasmā na
tika-abh03t0:67_2: vuttanti ce? Avibhāgehi tehi vippayogavacanassa ayuttattā. Vibhāge hi sati samudayasaccaṁ
tika-abh03t0:67_4: yuttaṁ vattuṁ vibhāgeneva visabhāgatāya saṅgahitattā, vibhāgarahitehi pana vedanākkhandhādīhi
tika-abh03t0:67_5: na yuttaṁ, tehi vijjamānehi vijjamānassa samudayassa visabhāgabhāvābhāvato. Yañhi
tika-abh03t0:67_6: anuppannā dhammā viya āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ na hoti saṅkhataṁ uddharitabbaṁ, taṁ paccuppannabhāvaṁ
tika-abh03t0:67_7: nissāya sampayogīvippayogībhāvena uddharīyati, tañca vibhāgarahitehi khandhādīhi
tika-abh03t0:67_8: saṅkhatehi paccuppannabhāvameva nissāya anāmaṭṭhakālabhede atthitāya eva nissitabbattā.
tika-abh03t0:67_9: Avijjamānassa hi avijjamānena, avijjamānassa ca vijjamānena, vijjamānassa ca avijjamānena
tika-abh03t0:67_10: sampayogo natthi, vippayogo pana avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahite teneva visabhāgatāpi
tika-abh03t0:67_11: gahitā evāti hoti. Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā
tika-abh03t0:67_12: sati sabhāgatte vijjamānatāya eva dhammānaṁ sabhāgassa paricchindanato vijjamānatā
tika-abh03t0:67_13: dassitāti ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātā sabhāgatāpi gahitā eva hoti. Tassā ca gahitattā
tika-abh03t0:67_14: sampayogova labbhati, na vippayogo, tasmā samudayasaccaṁ vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttattena
tika-abh03t0:67_15: vuttaṁ, na vippayuttattenāti. Esa nayo maggasaccādīsupīti.
tika-abh03t0:68_1: ye padhānā vitakko viya koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā, te eva idha avitakkavicāramattāti
tika-abh03t0:68_2: adhippetāti dasseti. Teneva hi anantaranaye samudayasaccena samānagatikā na savitakkasavicārehīti
tika-abh03t0:68_3: te na gahitā. Dasamosānanayesu ca tehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ tehi vippayuttānañca
tika-abh03t0:68_4: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo aṭṭhārasasaṅgahito ca vutto. Vitakkasahitesupi pana tesu
tika-abh03t0:68_5: gahitesu sabbepi te vicārena sampayuttāti “ekena khandhena kehici sampayuttā”ti sakkā
tika-abh03t0:68_6: vattuṁ. So hi samudāyo vicāraṁ vajjetvā aññena kenaci sampayutto na hoti. Na hi tadekadesassa
tika-abh03t0:68_7: vitakkassa vicārato aññena sampayogo samudāyassa hoti. Yathā nānācittuppādesu uppajjamānānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:68_8: iddhipādānaṁ samudāyassa iddhipādassa ekadesānaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo samudāyassa
tika-abh03t0:68_9: na hoti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yathā pana tesu ekopi vedanāsaññākkhandhehi saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena
tika-abh03t0:68_10: ca asampayutto nāma natthīti samudāyassa tehi sampayuttatā vuttā, evamidhāpi vicārena
tika-abh03t0:68_11: asampayuttassa avitakkavicāramattassa kassaci abhāvato samudāyassa tena sampayuttatā
tika-abh03t0:68_12: na na sakkā vattuṁ. Na hi avitakkavicāramattānaṁ dassanenapahātabbahetukādīnaṁ viya
tika-abh03t0:68_13: sampayuttatā na vattabbā. Yathā hi dassanenapahātabbahetukesu keci saṅkhārakkhandhekadesena
tika-abh03t0:68_14: mohena sampayuttā, keci asampayuttāti na samudāyo tena sampayutto, nāpi añño koci
tika-abh03t0:68_15: dhammo atthi, yena so samudāyo sampayutto siyāti “dassanenapahātabbahetukā dhammā
tika-abh03t0:68_16: sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṁ, evaṁ bhāvanāyapahātabbahetukasahetukādayopi. Na panevaṁ
tika-abh03t0:68_17: yena avitakkavicāramattasamudāyo sampayutto siyā, taṁ natthi avitakkavicāramattesu
tika-abh03t0:68_18: kassaci vicārena asampayuttassa abhāvā, tasmā te “sampayuttā”ti na na vattabbāti.
tika-abh03t0:68_19: Sabbattha ca ekadhammepi kehicīti bahuvacananiddeso saṅkhāya aniyamitattā katoti veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:71_1: gahitā. Samudayasaccādīni satipi tehi sampayutte, sampayuttehi ca vippayutte sampayuttenavippayuttānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:71_2: khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvato. Na hi samudayasaccena sampayuttehi lobhasahagatacittuppādehi
tika-abh03t0:71_3: vippayuttānaṁ tato aññadhammānaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo atthi. Nanu ca te eva
tika-abh03t0:71_4: cittuppādā cattāro khandhā aḍḍhadutiyāni āyatanāni aḍḍhadutiyā dhātuyo ca hontīti
tika-abh03t0:71_5: tehi vippayogo vattabboti? Na, tadaññadhammānaṁ khandhādibhāvato. Na hi te eva dhammā
tika-abh03t0:71_6: cattāro khandhā, atha kho te ca tato aññe ca, tathā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyopi. Na
tika-abh03t0:71_7: ca tadaññasamudāyehi aññe vippayuttā honti samudāyekadesānaṁ ekadesaññasamudāyānañca
tika-abh03t0:71_8: vippayogābhāvato. Esa nayo maggasaccasukhindriyādīsu. Avitakkavicāramattesupi niravasesesu
tika-abh03t0:71_9: adhippetesu tesaṁ savitakkasavicārasamānagatikattā aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ na dissati.
tika-abh03t0:72_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana evarūpānīti yathā rūpakkhandhe vissajjanaṁ na yujjati, evaṁ yesu
tika-abh03t0:72_1: aññesupi na yujjati, tāni vissajjanassa ayogena “evarūpānī”ti vuttāni, na sampayuttābhāvenāti
tika-abh03t0:72_2: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme dīpentīti etena vedanākkhandhādipadāni
tika-abh03t0:72_3: dasseti, viññāṇañca aññena asammissanti viññāṇakkhandhamanāyatanādipadāni. Tattha
tika-abh03t0:72_5: hi sampayuttehi sammissaviññāṇadīpakāni idha gahitānīti. Etena ca lakkhaṇena evarūpāneva
tika-abh03t0:72_6: gahitānīti dasseti, na evarūpāni gahitānevāti samudayasaccādiiddhipādādipadānaṁ asaṅgahitattā.
tika-abh03t0:72_7: “Atha phassasattakaṁ cittaṁ saha yuttapadehi sattā”ti purāṇapāṭho, ayaṁ pana ūnoti
tika-abh03t0:72_8: katvā “atha phassasattakaṁ, tike tayo satta mahantare cā”ti pāṭho kato.
tika-abh03t0:73_0: 309.Pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasenāti idaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭapadena
tika-abh03t0:73_1: sampayuttehi vippayuttā tena saddhiṁ vippayuttā hontīti katvā vuttaṁ. Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṁ
tika-abh03t0:73_2: dve ca manena yuttā, vitakkavicāraṇāti manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā dve vitakkavicārāti
tika-abh03t0:76_1: yathāniddhāritaṁ natthīti “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye
tika-abh03t0:76_2: dhammā sampayuttā”ti avatvā “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi
tika-abh03t0:76_3: khandhehi…pe… sampayuttāti natthī”ti vuttaṁ. Tena rūpakkhandhena vippayuttānaṁ kenaci
tika-abh03t0:76_5: kuto tassa puna khandhādīhi sampayuttatāti dasseti.
tika-abh03t0:79_1: yassa khandhādino vasenāti attho. Tassevāti ca tasseva khandhādinoti attho. Idaṁ
tika-abh03t0:79_2: vuttaṁ hoti – yaṁ idha sampayuttaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu yena vedanākkhandhādinā
tika-abh03t0:79_3: sampayuttaṁ, puna tasseva vedanākkhandhādino khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ
tika-abh03t0:79_4: kataṁ. Tañhi attanā sampayuttena sampayuttattā “sampayuttena sampayutta”nti niddhāritanti.
tika-abh03t0:79_5: Rūpena vāti etena nirodhasaccaappaccayaasaṅkhatehipi ayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh03t0:79_6: tathā rūpamissakehi vāti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi. Vakkhati
tika-abh03t0:79_8: sampayogo labbhatīti vattamānesu ekampi dhammaṁ anapanetvā avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi
tika-abh03t0:79_9: arūpabhavādīhīti attho. Ayaṁ panettha saṅkhepo – ye sampayogaṁ na labhanti rūpakkhandhādayo,
tika-abh03t0:79_10: te sabbe na gahitā, itare ca vedanākkhandhādayo sabbe gahitāti.
tika-abh03t0:82_1: tehi vippayuttassa abhāvā na gahitā, dukkhasaccacatumahābhavaabyākatādidhammā tehi
tika-abh03t0:82_2: vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogābhāvatoti ayaṁ viseso veditabboti.
tika-abh03t0:85_0: 409. Ekādasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ “te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi ekena manāyatanena sattahi
tika-abh03t0:85_1: viññāṇadhātūhī”ti etesaṁ padānaṁ “sampayuttā nāmā”ti etena saha sambandho. “Kehicī”ti
tika-abh03t0:85_2: etassa panatthaṁ dassetuṁ “saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā
tika-abh03t0:85_3: taṇha”nti etena “te cā”ti vutte samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitadhamme
tika-abh03t0:85_4: visesetvā tesaṁ eva visesitānaṁ attavajjehi sesehi saṅkhārakkhandhe taṇhāya dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu
tika-abh03t0:85_5: ca taṇhāya vedanāsaññākkhandhehi sampayogārahehi sampayuttataṁ sandhāyāha “sesehi
tika-abh03t0:88: 417. Dvādasamanaye ca navamanaye viya sampayogārahāva labbhantīti āha “teyeva uddhaṭā”ti.
tika-abh03t0:91_0: 448. Terasamanayavaṇṇanāyaṁ yehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ viññāṇameva hoti, te
tika-abh03t0:91_2: sadisapañhā dhammā”ti vuttā. Yehi pana tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitāni arūpabhavena
tika-abh03t0:91_3: viya oḷārikāyatanāneva honti, te vuttāvasesā sabbe idha uddhaṭā “arūpabhavena sadisā”ti
tika-abh03t0:91_4: vuttā. Sesāti sesā pañcamanaye āgatā vedanākkhandhādayo satipi asaṅgāhakatte idha
tika-abh03t0:91_5: vissajjanaṁ na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā. Ye pana asaṅgāhakā eva na honti dukkhasaccādidhammā,
tika-abh03t0:91_6: tesu vattabbameva natthi. Yathā pana vedanākkhandhādayo na ruhanti, taṁ dassetuṁ
tika-abh03t0:91_7: “vedanākkhandhena hī”tiādimāha. Tattha tesañca sampayogo nāma natthīti rūpārūpadhammānaṁ
tika-abh03t0:92_0: Yadi pana te kadāci asabbaviññāṇadhātusampayuttā arūpadhammā rūpadhammā ca siyuṁ,
tika-abh03t0:92_1: na tesaṁ vippayogo natthīti “vippayogo ca natthī”ti na vuttaṁ, na vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh03t0:92_2: asaṅgahitānaṁ vippayogassa atthitāyāti veditabbaṁ. Ubhayābhāvato hi vedanākkhandhādayo
tika-abh03t0:92_3: idha na ruhantīti. Evaṁ panettha siyā “vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena anārammaṇamissakā
tika-abh03t0:92_4: sattaviññāṇadhātudhammā asaṅgahitā honti, tesañca sampayogo vippayogo ca natthī”ti.
tika-abh03t0:92_8: catubbidho vippayogo. Tattha jātivippayogo “kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā”tiādi,
tika-abh03t0:92_10: dhammā”tiādi, santānavippayogo “ajjhattā dhammā, bahiddhā dhammā”tiādi. Evaṁ vippayogo catudhā veditabbo.
tika-abh03t0:95_1: vippayogassa aruhaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Jātiādittayassa cettha dhammasabhāvamattattā na
tika-abh03t0:95_2: kathañci sampayogo vippayogo ca ruhati ajjhattabahiddhadhammānaṁ sabbadhammasamodhānattā,
tika-abh03t0:96_0: Pāḷiuddānagāthāyaṁ samucchede na labbhantīti pariyosāne naye na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh03t0:96_1: Moghapucchakena cāti alabbhamānā ca te moghapucchakena hetunā na labbhanti tesaṁ
tika-abh03t0:96_2: pucchāya moghattāti vuttaṁ hoti. Atha vā moghapucchako aṭṭhamo nayo, tena ca saha
tika-abh03t0:96_3: osānanaye ete dhammā vippayogassapi abhāvā sabbathāpi na labbhantīti attho.
